overview: This CD-DVD is one of 5 sets Let's Start Smart provides for young children to learn complete patterns of phonics. All sets are created to help children develop their reading readiness skills in a unique and effective way. Programs are designed by certified teachers and professional musicians. This CD-DVD set teaches children how to blend individual letter sounds and discover digraphs. They will improve children's skills in decoding and sounding out words to become better readers.
title: Start Smart: Blends and Digraphs
